Infantry Battle Suit.name: Infantry Battle Suit
Infantry Battle Suit.description:
A full suit of armor with boots and gloves.

@UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02ballisticpro00]{Ballistic Protection}: Reduces the damage from bullets by 4. “Bullets” includes physical shot fired from a firearm.

Robes.name: Robes
Robes.description: Heavy winter clothing, supple leather armor, soft hides.

Kevlar helmet.name: Kevlar helmet
Kevlar helmet.description: @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02ballisticpro00]{Ballistic Protection}: Reduces the damage from bullets by 4. “Bullets” includes physical shot fired from a firearm.

Polymer Shield, large.name: Polymer Shield, large
Polymer Shield, large.description:
Shields add to a character’s @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Parry} as shown in the Parry rating. @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03coverandobst00]{Cover} subtracts from ranged attacks from the front and shielded side (attacks from the rear or unprotected side ignore cover).

Polymer shields are @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03breakingthin00]{Hardness} 10 and provide +4 @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02armor000000000]{Armor} should someone attempt to shoot through them (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03coverandobst00]{Obstacles}).

While worn, shields can be used to bash for Str+d4 damage.

Plate Barding (horse).name: Plate Barding (horse)
Plate Barding (horse).description: Heavy steel armor made with “plates” of metal.

Leggings (Chain Mail).description: Chain, splint, metal scale, ring mail, samurai armor.

Battle Helmet w/ Energy Skin.name: Battle Helmet w/ Energy Skin
Battle Helmet w/ Energy Skin.description:
@UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02armor000000000]{Armor} used by private or state armed forces.

@UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02energyskin0000]{Energy Skin}: This armor is treated with an “energy skin” (or skein) to diffuse energy, reducing damage from lasers by 4. This costs 50% of the armor treated and is very shiny, subtracting 2 from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Stealth]{Stealth} rolls based on vision.

@UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02ballisticpro00]{Ballistic Protection}: Reduces the damage from bullets by 4. “Bullets” includes physical shot fired from a firearm.

While worn, shields can be used to bash for Str+d4 damage.

Riot Shield.description:

Bombproof suit.name: Bombproof suit
Bombproof suit.description: Bombproof suits aren’t built for flexibility except in the hands, which are uncovered. @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Agility} and related skills that require more than manual dexterity cannot exceed d6 while wearing the suit, and @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03movement000000]{Pace} is reduced by 2 (in addition to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02minimumstren00]{Minimum Strength} penalties).
Bombproof suit.notes: Bombproof suits aren’t built for flexibility except in the hands, which are uncovered. Agility and related skills that require more than manual dexterity cannot exceed d6 while wearing the suit, and Pace is reduced by 2 (in addition to Minimum Strength penalties).

Body Armor.name: Body Armor
Body Armor.description:
Light, armored clothing made from complex polymers or advanced ballistic weave.

@UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02ballisticpro00]{Ballistic Protection}: Reduces the damage from bullets by 4. “Bullets” includes physical shot fired from a firearm.
Body Armor.notes: Light, armored clothing made from complex polymers or advanced ballistic weave.

Ballistic Shield.description:
Shields add to a character’s @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01characters0000]{Parry} as shown in the Parry rating. @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03coverandobst00]{Cover} subtracts from ranged attacks from the front and shielded side (attacks from the rear or unprotected side ignore cover).

Modern shields are @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03breakingthin00]{Hardness} 12 and provide +2 @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02armor000000000]{Armor} should someone attempt to shoot through them (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03coverandobst00]{Obstacles}).

While worn, shields can be used to bash for Str+d4 damage.
Ballistic Shield.notes: Reduces damage from firearms by 4 when an attacker tries to shoot through it.
